sentences.en: Claire had made me promise to tell her the truth.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔要我保证把真相告诉她。

sentences.en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentences.cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentences.en: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

sentences.en: How far did the film tell the truth about Barnes Wallis?
sentences.cn: 影片讲述的巴恩斯·沃利斯的故事有多少真实的成分？

sentences.en: I think, if truth be told, we were all a little afraid of him.
sentences.cn: 说老实话，我认为我们当时都有点儿怕他。

sentences.en: In the town very few know the whole truth.
sentences.cn: 镇子里只有很少人知道全部实情。

sentences.en: in truth, she was more than a little unhappy.
sentences.cn: 实际上，她很不高兴。

sentences.en: Postmodernists say there is no objective truth. Why should anyone believe them?
sentences.cn: 后现代主义者声称不存在客观事实。人们凭什么要相信他们呢？

sentences.en: She called the verdict a victory of truth over falsehood.
sentences.cn: 她将这一判决称为真理对谬误的胜利。

sentences.en: The experience has taught us some basic truths .
sentences.cn: 这次经历教会我们一些基本的道理。

sentences.en: The experience has taught us some basic truths.
sentences.cn: 这次经历教会我们一些基本的道理。

sentences.en: The only one who's anywhere close to the truth is my mother.
sentences.cn: 唯一算得上了解真相的人是我的母亲。

sentences.en: The truth is, I'm a failed comedy writer really.
sentences.cn: 事实上，我真的是个很失败的喜剧作家。

sentences.en: The truth of the matter is that we had no other choice.
sentences.cn: 实情就是我们别无选择。

sentences.en: Then the chilling truth dawned on Captain Gary Snavely.
sentences.cn: 接着加里·斯内夫利船长意识到了这个令人不寒而栗的事实。

sentences.en: They can't destroy truth without destroying each and every one of us.
sentences.cn: 除非他们将我们赶尽杀绝，否则真理不灭。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I don't think much of psychiatrists.
sentences.cn: 说实话，我不太喜欢精神科医生。

sentences.en: Truth to tell, John did not want Veronica at his wedding.
sentences.cn: 说实在的，约翰不想韦罗妮卡参加他的婚礼。

sentences.en: We set out to find the truth behind the mystery.
sentences.cn: 我们开始着手揭开谜团背后的真相。

sentences.en: We want to get at the truth. Who killed him? And why?
sentences.cn: 我们想查明真相。是谁杀了他？为什么？
